$Btc, $Ltc, and $Eth walk into a bar... They order a plate of mozzarella sticks. The food comes out and Bitcoin eats two sticks in one bite! Litecoin just gives a frozen stare and doesn't do anything. Ethereum raises his hand to the waiter and asks "Can I get a fork?"
